DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare MRI enteroclysis with MRI of the small bowel with a per oral 6%mannitol solution.Our hypothesis is that the peroral technique preform the same way as MRI Enteroclysis.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of MR Enteroclysis and MRI With Per Oral Contrast Using a 6 % Mannitol Solution.
DOC.criteria: above 18 years known Crohns disease or strong suspicion. need of a small bowel examination pregnant electrolyte disturbances. Any MRI contraindications.
